title: No quarantine for international passengers arriving in Delhi - Hindustan Times
content: No quarantine for international passengers arriving in Delhi  Hindustan TimesView Full coverage on Google News
description: Passengers found to be symptomatic during screening will be immediately isolated and taken to a medical facility. If they test positive, their contacts will also be identified and tested, an official said. If travellers test positive for Covid-19, their samples would be sent for genome sequencing.
